testcase.name: Register with valid input data
testcase.system-out: Given I enter valid Url.....................................................passed And I click on SignUp.......................................................passed When I enter valid FirstName "New"..........................................passed And I enter valid LastName "Admin"..........................................passed And I enter valid Email "admin1@gmail.com"..................................passed And I enter valid UserName "Admin_1020".....................................passed And I enter valid Password "Admin_1"........................................passed And I enter valid ConfirmPassword "Admin_1".................................passed And I click on Register buttton.............................................passed Then I should registered successfully with Name "New Admin" and Email "admin1@gmail.com".passed Then I should compose Mail..................................................passed Then I should enter valid details and click on send button..................passed Then I should see acknowledgement message...................................passed
